text: Gardnar Putnam "Gar" Mulloy (November 22, 1913 - November 14, 2016) was a former U.S. No. 1 tennis player primarily. He was known for playing in doubles matches with partner Billy Talbert. He was born in Washington, D.C.. Mulloy turned 100 in November 2013. Mulloy died in Miami, Florida on November 14, 2016 from complications of a stroke, aged 102.Tennis legend Gardnar Mulloy of Miami dies at 102 ==References== Category:1913 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:American centenarians Category:American tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Washington, D.C.
title: Gardnar Mulloy
